channel.title: Rslegion Forum And Private Server
channel.description:
Hey Im the owner of Rslegion i am looking for a few coders/hosters (24/7 host = co-owner postion) the web address is [url=http://www.rslegion.net]www.rslegion.net[/url]
please use the apllication form listed there and make a phew post while your at it =). or add my msn [email]admin@rslegion.net[/email]
atops available:
coders: Me Silent 'free space'
Hosters: free space 24/7 host 24/7 host (Second World)
My aim is to ned up with too versions of the server linked together hosted by two different people each with a cappacity of at least 30 people
The Owner[br][size=1]Posted on: March 19, 2007, 12:04:51 PM[/size][hr]anyone?
